attributes.action: Urge the Prime Minister to put pressure on the EU and Spain to end Bull-fighting
attributes.additional_details: Two  Provincial Governments in Spain HAVE banned it, Barcelona and the Canary Islands.  Put pressure on the Spanish that we will not tolerate this practice in the EU.
attributes.background: Well, the title says it all.  The UK banned cruelty to animals in 1830 yet the Spanish and their Latin cousins around the world still practice this barbaric act.  Help stop it forever.
